n:
> There are no strict rules about this classification because the borderlines are vague. If need be, like a middle-aged man who is not sure whether to call himself bald or not bald, he should explain himself more fully.

I would consider milestone 6 to be the most accurate representation of where I stand.

So it begins.

Luckily, they are still maintaining Saturday package delivery. There are a lot of seniors who depend on mail-order, prescription drugs that live outside of UPS and FedEx delivery zones.
d: Postal Service to Cut Saturday Mail
